title: History brought to life. King of kings
creator_credit: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, Pathé Frères and Cecil B. DeMille
brief_description: History brought to life (9 mins) hosted by Cecil B. DeMille unfolds the glory of early Hollywood and its massive industry at work, providing a dazzling array of stars and historic milestone film events. “King of kings” (1927-112 mins) acknowledged as the definitive film of Jesus, presents the story of Christ as a moving portrait seen through the eyes of Mary Magdalene.
